information: Elegant women's headdress made of gold, flowers made of canelo clay, colors based on a terracotta palette and purple gradient, made with natural stones, river pearls, and beads. Clay pieces fired at 600-700 degrees °C. Hand-embroidered.
recommendations: Do not come into contact with water and clean with a slightly damp cloth. NO soap.

information: Elegant earring/cufflink with the figure of the so-called “Tonalá Flower”, the material is composed of canelo clay plates, pigmented with natural earths. Clay pieces fired at 600-700 degrees °C.
Clutch-style bag for women based on a terracotta color palette and purple details. It features an artisanal technique called colonial loom. Made with goat leather.
recommendations: Clean with a slightly damp cloth. NO soap.

information: Handbag for men based on a terracotta color palette and purple details. It features an artisanal technique called colonial loom. Made with goat leather.
recommendations: Clean with a slightly damp cloth. NO soap.

information: Women's shoes made from goat leather.
recommendations: Clean with a slightly damp cloth. NO soap.
